title: #329 – Kate Darling: Social Robots, Ethics, Privacy and the Future of MIT
description: Kate Darling is a researcher at MIT Media Lab interested in human robot interaction and robot ethics. OUTLINE:
Here’s the timestamps for the episode. On some podcast players you should be able to click the timestamp to jump to that time.
(00:00) – Introduction
(07:57) – What is a robot?
